Title: Relates to the circumvention of an ignition interlock device
Summary: Relates to the circumvention of an ignition interlock device, making the designation and classification of offense for circumventing an interlock device match the underlying offense which required the installation of such device, such offenses shall remain a class A misdemeanor for those that circumvent such device but have no underlying conviction.
LawCode: Amd ยง1198, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the circumvention of an ignition interlock device
